member.name: T:iTin.Core.Drawing.ComponentModel.ImageStyle
member.summary: Specifies the alignment of the content on the drawing surface.

member.name: F:iTin.Core.Drawing.ComponentModel.ImageStyle.TopLeft
member.summary: The image is aligned vertically at the top and horizontally at the left.

member.name: F:iTin.Core.Drawing.ComponentModel.ImageStyle.TopMiddle
member.summary: The content is aligned vertically at the top and horizontally at the center.

member.summary: The image is aligned vertically on the top and horizontally on the right.

member.name: F:iTin.Core.Drawing.ComponentModel.ImageStyle.CenterLeft
member.summary: The image is aligned vertically in the middle and horizontally to the left.

member.name: F:iTin.Core.Drawing.ComponentModel.ImageStyle.CenterMiddle
member.summary: The image is aligned vertically in the middle and horizontally in the center.

member.name: F:iTin.Core.Drawing.ComponentModel.ImageStyle.CenterRight
member.summary: The image is aligned vertically in the middle and horizontally to the right.

member.name: F:iTin.Core.Drawing.ComponentModel.ImageStyle.BottomLeft
member.summary: The image is aligned vertically on the bottom and horizontally on the left.

member.name: F:iTin.Core.Drawing.ComponentModel.ImageStyle.BottomMiddle
member.summary: The image is aligned vertically at the bottom and horizontally at the center.

member.name: F:iTin.Core.Drawing.ComponentModel.ImageStyle.BottomRight
member.summary: The image is aligned vertically on the bottom and horizontally on the right.

member.name: F:iTin.Core.Drawing.ComponentModel.ImageStyle.Stretch

member.summary: Invert the image horizontally, and then tile it.

member.summary: Invert the image horizontally and vertically, and then tile it.

member.name: M:iTin.Core.Drawing.RectangleExtensions.Split(System.Drawing.Rectangle,iTin.Core.Drawing.ComponentModel.Orientation,System.Single)
member.summary: Returns a one-dimensional zero-based matrix that contains two elements.
member.param: structure that represents the source rectangle.

member.returns: A new matrix of structures. If the diemsiones of the source rectangle are not valid, Split returns an array of a single element that contains the source rectangle.
member.remarks: The first element of the matrix is always the result of applying the criteria of orientation and length.

member.name: M:iTin.Core.Drawing.RectangleFExtensions.Split(System.Drawing.RectangleF,iTin.Core.Drawing.ComponentModel.Orientation)

member.name: M:iTin.Core.Drawing.RectangleFExtensions.Split(System.Drawing.RectangleF,iTin.Core.Drawing.ComponentModel.Orientation,System.Single)
member.summary: Returns a one-dimensional zero-based matrix that contains two elements.
member.param: structure that represents the source rectangle.
One of the values in the enumeration that represents the type of orientation.
Value in percentage of the length of the first rectangle.
member.returns: A new matrix of structures. If the diemsiones of the source rectangle are not valid, Split returns an array of a single element that contains the source rectangle.
member.remarks: The first element of the matrix is always the result of applying the criteria of orientation and length.

member.name: T:iTin.Core.Drawing.Helpers.ColorHelper
member.summary: Static class that contains methods for manipulating structures of type .

member.name: M:iTin.Core.Drawing.Helpers.ColorHelper.GetColorFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a new structure from its name, its hexdecimal encoding or from color space definition.
member.param: A that represents the color to convert.
member.returns: Creates a new structure from the specified string color.
member.remarks:
The parameter may contain:
A color name, such as , .
A hexadecimal RGB color encoding preceded by the character #, such as #00FF00, #00FFFF.
A space color definition, for this has to precede the color string with this string sc#.
for example sc# 0.15 0.15 0.15, where the three color components (RGB) are set to 15% of its maximum value, producing a very light gray. Each component has to be between 0.0 and 1.0.

Second color
Percentage of the second color.
member.returns: Returns a new structure as result of the combination.
